    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    ValueWithAttributes LoyaltyCertificate

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:LoyaltyCertificate

      • Description

        Identifies the Loyalty Program, membership, form factor used by the certificate and its current status.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<LoyaltyCertificate certificateNumber="90374638372" effectiveDate="0901" expireDate="1022" expireDateExclusiveInd="true" format="Paper" iD="loyaltyCertificate_1" iD_Context="Marriott Rewards" memberNumber="283746397988" numberOfNights="3" programName="Marriott Rewards" status="Available" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "LoyaltyCertificate" : {
    "value" : null,
    "iD" : "loyaltyCertificate_1",
    "iD_Context" : "Marriott Rewards",
    "certificateNumber" : "90374638372",
    "memberNumber" : "283746397988",
    "programName" : "Marriott Rewards",
    "effectiveDate" : "0901",
    "expireDate" : "1022",
    "numberOfNights" : 3,
    "format" : "Paper",
    "status" : "Available",
    "expireDateExclusiveInd" : true
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        iD
        A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:ID
        Example Value loyaltyCertificate_1
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        iD_Context
        Identifies the source of the code that identifies program or promotion within a loyalty scheme.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Marriott Rewards
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        certificateNumber
        The loyalty redemption certificate identifier.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value 90374638372
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        memberNumber
        Unique identifier of the member in the program.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value 283746397988
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        programName
        This identifies the loyalty program.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Marriott Rewards
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        effectiveDate
        Indicates the starting date.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:date
        Example Value 0901
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        expireDate
        Indicates the ending date.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:date
        Example Value 1022
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        numberOfNights
        The number of accommodation nights that are covered by this certificate.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 3
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        format
        Indicates what form the certificate is in e.g. Paper or Electronic.
        Details
        Type LoyaltyCertificateFormat_Enum
        Example Value Paper
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        status
        Used to define the status of the certificate e.g. Available, Voided, Cancelled, Reserved, Used.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Available
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        expireDateExclusiveInd
        When true, indicates that the ExpireDate is the first day after the applicable period (e.g. when expire date is Oct 15 the last date of the period is Oct 14).
